statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.19}+{5.23}\right)}={26.84}\approx{26.84}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.23}\cdot{8.11}={42.4153}\approx{42.4}.
